server

Class WebsocketEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.WebsocketEndpoint

  • public class WebsocketEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the server endpoint /events which is used to handle all possible interfaces by their interface_name.

      • onWebSocketConnect

        public void onWebSocketConnect(javax.websocket.Session sess)
        When a client connects via websocket their will be a message in the log.
        Parameters:

      • onWebSocketMessage

        public void onWebSocketMessage(java.lang.String message,
                               javax.websocket.Session session)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method handles all incoming websocket messages. It validates the incoming json. It handles all exception which could happen. It handles the json and pass them to the right interface.
        Parameters:
        message - will be passed to the interface.
        session - Needed to check up a user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when something bad happen.

      • onWebSocketClose

        public void onWebSocketClose(javax.websocket.Session session)
                      throws NotLoggedInException,
                             java.sql.SQLException,
                             javax.mail.MessagingException
        Ensure that the user will be logged out.
        Parameters:
        session - needed to check up the user who will be logged out.
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException
        java.sql.SQLException
        javax.mail.MessagingException
